TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ServiceBusyException extends System.Exception

summary.span: 例外狀況類別，表示 CardSpace 服務正忙於處理其他要求。

span.span: Exception class to indicate that the CardSpace service is busy processing other requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ServiceBusyException 例外狀況，表示 CardSpace 服務正忙於處理其他要求。A ServiceBusyException exception is thrown to indicate that the CardSpace service is busy processing other requests. CardSpace 不會將要求放入佇列，並且一次只能服務一個要求。CardSpace does not queue requests, and can service only one request at a time. 請判斷是否有另一個 CardSpace 的執行個體正在執行。Determine whether another instance of CardSpace is running. 如果有另一個執行個體正在執行，請從 [工作管理員] 停止 icardagt.exe 處理序，結束該處理序。If there is another instance running, end it by stopping the icardagt.exe process from Task Manager.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的執行個體。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的執行個體。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

span.span: The message that describes the error.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 類別的執行個體。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class with the specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式 (Constructor) 會將新執行個體的 屬性初始化為系統提供用來描述錯誤的訊息。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error. 訊息的內容也應該要讓使用者能夠讀懂。The content of the message should also be understandable to the user.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed
Protected Sub New (info As SerializationInfo, context As StreamingContext)

param.name: info
param.span: 物件，其中保存有關要擲回之例外狀況的序列化物件資料。

span.span: The object that holds the serialized object data about the exception that is being thrown.

param.name: context
param.span: 物件，包含關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

span.span: The object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.

summary.span: 使用指定的序列化 (Serialization) 資訊與資料流 (Streaming) 內容，初始化 類別的執行個體。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class with serialization information and streaming context specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, innerException As Exception)

span.span: The message that describes the error.

param.name: innerException
param.span: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及此例外原因之內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 類別的執行個體。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class with the specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
